document_title: Blood in the urine (hematuria): Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
Urinating blood is not dangerous. This is a symptom of urinary system disease. Symptoms can be completely cured when the patient's urinary disease is controlled and treated.
Most urinary diseases that cause acute hematuria can be treated medically with medication or go away on their own after a period of time. Therefore, when blood in the urine appears, the patient should not be too stressed but should see a specialist immediately for timely treatment.
Although hematuria is not a dangerous health condition, patients need to pay attention to treatment and control the disease well so that it does not develop into other serious complications. One of the complications of hematuria that patients need to prevent is cancer.
